§ 10174. Consideration in siting facilities The Secretary, in siting Federal research projects, shall give special consideration to proposals from States where a repository is located. (Pub. L. 97–425, title I, § 174, as added Pub. L. 100–202, § 101(d) [title III, § 300], Dec. 22, 1987, 101 Stat. 1329–104, 1329–121; Pub. L. 100–203, title V, § 5031, Dec. 22, 1987, 101 Stat. 1330–240.)
Editorial Notes Codification Pub. L. 100–202 and Pub. L. 100–203 added identical sections.
